channel.title: CVE Feed for DPDK -- dpdk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DPDK -- dpdk

item.title: CVE-2019-14818|2024-08-05T00:26:39.137Z -- dpdk -- dpdk
item.description: A flaw was found in all dpdk version 17.x.x before 17.11.8, 16.x.x before 16.11.10, 18.x.x before 18.11.4 and 19.x.x before 19.08.1 where a malicious master, or a container with access to vhost_user socket, can send specially crafted VRING_SET_NUM messages, resulting in a memory leak including file descriptors. This flaw could lead to a denial of service condition.
